greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of Product_{k>=1} (1 + x^(2*k))^(2*k)/(1 + x^(2*k-1))^(2*k-1).
link: Vaclav Kotesovec, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..2000
formula: a(n) ~ (-1)^n * exp(-1/12 + 3 * 2^(-5/3) * (7*Zeta(3))^(1/3) * n^(2/3)) * A * (7*Zeta(3))^(5/36) / (2^(10/9) * sqrt(3*Pi) * n^(23/36)), where A is the Glaisher-Kinkelin constant A074962. - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Apr 17 2017
mathematica: nmax = 50; CoefficientList[Series[Product[(1 + x^(2*k))^(2*k)/(1 + x^(2*k-1))^(2*k-1), {k, 1, nmax}], {x, 0, nmax}], x] (* _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Apr 15 2017 *)
results.author: _Seiichi Manyama_, Apr 15 2017
